suggest.doctrine/migrations: To use the OctoLab\Common\Doctrine\Migration (~1.0 is recommended)
suggest.jolicode/jolinotif: Optional to use with Monolog for showing desktop notification (^1.0.5 is recommended)
suggest.monolog/monolog: To use the OctoLab\Common\Monolog (~1.0 is recommended)
suggest.phpunit/phpunit: Optional to use the OctoLab\Common\Test (~4.8 is recommended)
suggest.symfony/config: To use the OctoLab\Common\Config (~3.0 is recommended)
suggest.symfony/filesystem: To use the OctoLab\Common\Composer\Script (~3.0 is recommended)
suggest.symfony/yaml: Optional to use the OctoLab\Common\Config (~3.0 is recommended)
